resources.string: Find a quiet spot, relax, and engage fully. Listen to the audio (1-3 minutes) with a picture to enhance the moment. You can pause and resume anytime.

-Think of this as building a “mental movie” of your success related to your long term goal. 


-Click "Inspire" to spark your imagination with a Mental Movie example. 


-Generating takes 20 to 60 seconds. 


-Tap the "here" button for more guidance.


-If you are unsatisfied with the voice, you can change it in the settings.
"Describe where the mental movie takes place (e.g., Spain, at the beach, in a meeting). The more specific the location, the more personalized the story will be."
"Specify when the mental movie takes place (e.g., in one month, this Saturday morning, tomorrow). The more precise the time, the more tailored the story becomes."
"Describe the action you are performing during the mental movie (e.g., running, swimming, presenting, hiking). The more specific, the more immersive and personalized the story becomes."
"Describe the objects you are noticing during the mental movie (e.g., trees, glasses, a laptop, waves, a coffee cup). The more specific, the more vivid and immersive the story becomes."
"Describe who is involved in the mental movie (e.g., yourself, your girl,boy-friend, family). Providing names makes the story more personalized."

I want to create a Treatment Self-Regulation Questionnaire (TSRQ) Poll with 15 Questions. This questions has 15 items: 6 that assess autonomous motivation, 6 that assess controlled motivation, and 3 that assess amotivation. The autonomous motivation subscale consists of items #1, 3, 6, 8, 11, & 13; the controlled motivation subscale consists of items #2, 4, 7, 9, 12, & 14; and the amotivation subscale consists of items #5, 10, & 15.

For example the questions could look like this:

The reason I would do more pushups is:

1. Because I feel that I want to take responsibility for my own fitness.
2. Because I would feel guilty or ashamed of myself if I didn’t do more pushups.
3. Because I personally believe it is the best thing for my physical health.
4. Because others would be upset with me if I didn’t do more pushups.
5. I really don’t think about it.
6. Because I have carefully thought about it and believe it is very important for many aspects of my life.
7. Because I would feel bad about myself if I didn’t do more pushups.
8. Because it is an important choice I really want to make.
9. Because I feel pressure from others to do more pushups.
10. Because it is easier to do what I am told than think about it.
11. Because it is consistent with my life goals.
12. Because I want others to approve of me.
13. Because it is very important for being as fit as possible.
14. Because I want others to see I can do it.
15. I don’t really know why. Please give me only the questions (Please leave out the numbers, ex. 1. 2. and so on) and the first sentence with the reason, without any overhead as a result, just like the example i gave you.
Change the questions to the longterm goal:

"The poll is now finished. Once you press 'Finish Poll', your answers will be submitted and the poll will be complete. The poll icon will fade out for 1 week, so you won't be able to take the poll again until then. The next step is to create an event by clicking the 'AI Generated' in the next screen. "
